name: Ico Vis à Vis - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Ico Vis à Vis originates from Roberto Lazzeroni's idea of pairing two Icolounge armchairs to create a two-seater sofa for intimate conversations. The sofa has a structure in solid American walnut and features an 'S'-shaped upholstered backrest that envelops the occupant, extending into an armrest, offering a comfortable and stylish seating solution suitable for public spaces like hotel lobbies, lounge areas, and boutiques.
